params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.parent
params.description: Required. The name of the instance in which to create the restored database. This instance must be in the same project and have the same instance configuration as the instance containing the source backup. Values are of the form projects/<project>/instances/<instance>.

params.name: data.database_id
params.description: Required. The id of the database to create and restore to. This database must not already exist. The database_id appended to parent forms the full database name of the form projects/<project>/instances/<instance>/databases/<database_id>.

params.name: data.backup
params.description: Name of the backup from which to restore. Values are of the form projects/<project>/instances/<instance>/backups/<backup>.

params.name: data.encryption_config
params.description: Optional. An encryption configuration describing the encryption type and key resources in Cloud KMS used to encrypt/decrypt the database to restore to. If this field is not specified, the restored database will use the same encryption configuration as the backup by default, namely [encryption_type][google.spanner.admin.database.v1.RestoreDatabaseEncryptionConfig.encryption_type] = USE_CONFIG_DEFAULT_OR_BACKUP_ENCRYPTION.

methods.name: getEncryptionConfig
methods.description:
Optional. An encryption configuration describing the encryption type and key resources in Cloud KMS used to encrypt/decrypt the database to restore to.

If this field is not specified, the restored database will use the same encryption configuration as the backup by default, namely [encryption_type][google.spanner.admin.database.v1.RestoreDatabaseEncryptionConfig.encryption_type] = USE_CONFIG_DEFAULT_OR_BACKUP_ENCRYPTION.
